SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NICKNAME,
CASE WHEN SYSDATE - DATE_CREATED < 1/24/60 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - DATE_CREATED) * 24 * 60 * 60 ) || '초 전' WHEN SYSDATE - DATE_CREATED < 1/24 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - DATE_CREATED) * 24 * 60) || '분 전' WHEN SYSDATE - DATE_CREATED < 1 THEN FLOOR( (SYSDATE - DATE_CREATED) * 24) || '시간 전' ELSE TO_CHAR(DATE_CREATED, 'YYYY-MM-DD') END DATE_CREATED
FROM "TOGETHER" T JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, READ_COUNT, BOARD_IMG, TO_CHAR(DATE_CREATED, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일" HH24:MI:SS') DATE_CREATED, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_PROFILE, MEMBER_NO, MAX_PEOPLE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PARTICIPATION WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} ) CURRENT_PEOPLE FROM "TOGETHER" JOIN "MEMBER" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_DEL_FL = 'N' AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
